title: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman  APPEAL TO JAIL STANDARDS

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman  APPEAL TO JAIL STANDARDS
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Appeal from MCSO to Jail Standards on recent NON COMPLIANCE JAIL LIST. All letters to and from mcso to jail standards about the NON COMPLIANCE finding, including the letter to Sheriff McNAmara from Jail Standards telling him it was me that turned him in for the violation of not taking a man who was on kidney dialysis to the doctor appointments. Inter office memos concerning non compliance with the jail standards commission to the commissioners, Judge Felton, interoffice memos, to Major Pam, Richard Conoley, and Cody Blossman. Letters to and from attorneys for MCSO in the matter of Non Compliance with Jail Standards commission and the cost of these attorneys in this appeal.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

title: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman Exit Interviews

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Exit interviews from December 2022 until the present from all jailers deputies, and civilians, all employees until the present.
Employment history, date of employment, raises, schools, etc. of Katy Taylor, including all raises and current position and rate of pay.
Employment history of Jacob Atkinson, including pay.
Date of move by Richard Conoley from the Hwy 84 jail to the Jack Harwell.  Employment file of Richard Conoley including reprimands, letters to HR, and complaints, starting pay, starting location, present location, and pay.
Exit interview of Pam Whitlock.
All sexual harassment complaints against Richard Conoley from his start date to the present.
Employment history, and jailer license of Brandy Burson, including starting pay to the present, all schools, promotions.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
